content: **knitted neck warmer for men in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with texture ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-275 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl height 23-25 cm with fold-down **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150 g colour 53 moss green **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
